C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: { BasedOnStyle: LLVM, UseTab: Never, IndentWidth: 4, TabWidth: 4, BreakBeforeBraces: Stroustrup, AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine: false, IndentCaseLabels: false, ColumnLimit: 0, AccessModifierOffset: -4, PointerAlignment: Left, FixNamespaceComments : false, NamespaceIndentation : All, }
